doc:
Raymond Cruz https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raymond_Cruz 0 Raymond Cruz (born July 9, 1961) is an American actor, best known for his starring role as Detective Julio Sanchez in the series The Closer and his recurring role as the drug lord Tuco Salamanca in the crime drama Breaking Bad and its spin-off Better Call Saul. He also starred on the series Major Crimes, a spinoff of The Closer, reprising the role of Sanchez. Raymond_Cruz ( born July_9_,_1961 ) is an_American_actor , best_known for his_starring_role as Detective_Julio_Sanchez in the_series The_Closer and his_recurring_role as the_drug lord Tuco_Salamanca in the_crime_drama Breaking Bad and its_spin-off Better Call Saul . He also starred on the_series_Major_Crimes , a_spinoff of The_Closer , reprising the_role of Sanchez .
